[Transfer of Warder]:
[ Beginners ]

You will receive beginner benefits from now until you reach level 25. The benefits are as follows:
1. Equipment Trade: Used weapons and armor can be traded for better equipment, though the difference in value must be covered with additional Adena. Talk to the armor shop merchants for details.

2. Supplemental Magic:Ask the beginner's guide to cast supplemental magic, which helps a great deal in combat. You can receive supplemental magic from level 6 up to level 75.

3. Additional Soulshot and Spiritshot supplies: You will receive an additional reward upon completion of specific quests. Go and visit Zerstorer Marcela at the South Entrance of Kamael. He'll ask you to defeat the Green Goblins, Mountain Werewolves, Mostro Archers, Mountain Werewolf Chief, Mostro Guards and Hill Fungi on and around the Golden Hills. Do all he asks and you'll receive the Beginner Soulshots or Spiritshots as an additional reward.
